dataset_characteristics.class_distribution: Balanced (3 samples per class in test set)

key_findings: ⚠️ Low test accuracy (11.8%) indicates model struggles with current dataset
⚠️ Very low F1-score (0.037) suggests poor precision/recall balance
🎯 15 classes have zero F1-score, indicating classification difficulties
recommendations: 📊 Increase dataset size significantly (target: 1000+ samples per class)
🔄 Implement more aggressive data augmentation techniques
⚖️ Address class imbalance with weighted sampling or SMOTE
🧠 Consider ensemble methods or different architectures (EfficientNet, Vision Transformer)
📈 Implement progressive resizing and test-time augmentation
🎯 Use focal loss or class-balanced loss functions
🔍 Perform detailed error analysis and confusion matrix review
📝 Collect more diverse and representative training data
next_steps: 🔬 Implement Grad-CAM visualization for model interpretability
🌐 Develop REST API for model deployment
🧪 Set up continuous model evaluation pipeline
📚 Build knowledge base with disease information and remedies
🚀 Deploy model to cloud platform for scalability
